item.title: How-To: Stop iPhoto From Opening Automatically
item.description:
I’ve stopped using iPhoto recently in favour of Flickr but every time I plug in a camera, or something that looks like it could be a camera, iPhoto opens. A quick hunt around the Internet and I found the solution…

  1. Open “Image Capture”
  2. In “Preferences”, choose “No application” for the option “When a camera is connected, open”
  3. That’s it! You can quit Image Capture now.

How easy was that?!
